channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'I collect the names and make sure the servers are running...and spend the rest of the time fixing my boat': Tech entrepreneurs, Tonga, and the lucrative scheme to shake up the world wide web
item.description: The .to top-level domain became highly popular in the late 1990s during the early web boom time

item.title: India’s Sarvam launches Indus AI chat app as competition heats up
item.description: Sarvam's Indus chat app is currently available in beta.

item.title: 'We will not...flood our ecosystem with soulless AI slop,' new Xbox chief promises Xbox fans
item.description: Xbox chief Phil Spencer is leaving Microsoft, and Asha Sharma is the new lead and promises a renewed committment ot Xbox and not so much AI.
